Package eatree.controller

Class EatreeController

java.lang.Object
eatree.controller.EatreeController
All Implemented Interfaces:
IEatreeController
public class EatreeController extends Object implements IEatreeController
A controller implementation for a GUI view. This controller creates and uses a EatreeModel. It implements a state machine to keep track of the state the view should draw next.

      Parameters:
      view - view to use

    • nextFrame

      public void nextFrame()
      This method should be called whenever the controller should decide what the view should display. The controller will call one of the drawX()-Methods from the view.
      Specified by:
      nextFrame in interface IEatreeController
